mapper.select: SELECT rd.coinid, rd.amount, years, rd.evaluate guestappraisal, sacbi.evaluate, rd.score, rd.remark, rd.numindex, rd.totalreqcost, rd.totalevaluate, rd.amountofissue, rd.guestappraisal, rd.wmk, rd.whetherSample, rd.blockNum, rd.guestWRSize as size, rd.guestWRWeight as zhongliang, sacbi.fullsubject, sacbi.shortsubject, sacbi.facevaluedis, rd.guestWRGrade as gradename, (SELECT money FROM sys_box_basic_info box WHERE boxid=box.id) as boxCost, material, (SELECT ExtractValue ( m.fullname, "//value[@lang='zh_CN']" ) FROM sys_coin_material m WHERE m.id = material) caizhi, ExtractValue(st.fullname, "//value[@lang='zh_CN']") guojia, rd.version FROM request_detail rd, sys_mechanism_coin_basic_info sacbi, sys_country st WHERE rd.coinid = sacbi.id AND sacbi.country = st.id AND rd.requestid = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY rd.numindex

SELECT sacbi.id, catalogue, country, years, ExtractValue ( c.fullname, "//value[@lang='zh_CN']" ) guojia, fullsubject, shortsubject, commonlysubject, facevaluedis, material, (SELECT ExtractValue ( m.fullname, "//value[@lang='zh_CN']" ) FROM sys_coin_material m WHERE m.id = material) caizhi, (SELECT money FROM sys_box_basic_info box WHERE boxid=box.id) as boxCost, weight, size, version, evaluate, remarks, CONCAT_WS( c.shortname, fullsubject, shortsubject, commonlysubject, shortsubject, facevaluedis, VERSION ) FROM sys_mechanism_coin_basic_info sacbi, sys_country c WHERE c.id = sacbi.country
and sacbi.country =#{country}
and sacbi.years like CONCAT("%",#{years},"%")
and sacbi.facevaluedis like CONCAT("%",#{facevaluedis},"%")
and sacbi.material =#{material}
and sacbi.version like CONCAT("%",#{version},"%")
and sacbi.size like CONCAT("%",#{size},"%")
and CONCAT_WS( c.shortname, fullsubject, shortsubject, commonlysubject, shortsubject, facevaluedis, version ) like CONCAT("%",#{item},"%")
limit #{startRow},15

SELECT rc.id, rc.coincode,sc.shortname as guojia,smcbi.years,smcbi.fullsubject,smcbi.facevaluedis,scm.shortname as caizhi, rc.weight as zhongliang,rc.customSize as size,rc.difversion as version,rc.remark as coinremark,rc.guestWRGrade as grade, (CASE WHEN r.serviceid = 1 THEN '新评' WHEN r.serviceid = 2 THEN '重评' WHEN r.serviceid = 5 THEN '真品鉴定' END ) serviceid,rd.requestid,rcs.level,rc.score,rc.ratingreasondis from request_coin rc left join request_coin_score rcs on rcs.requestcoinid=rc.id, request_detail rd, sys_mechanism_coin_basic_info smcbi left join sys_coin_material scm on scm.id=smcbi.material, sys_country sc,request_main r where rd.id=rc.requestdetailid AND smcbi.country=sc.id AND rd.coinid=smcbi.id AND r.id=rd.requestid AND rc.coincode=#{coincode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY rc.coincode

SELECT rc.id, rc.coincode,sc.shortname as guojia,smcbi.years,smcbi.fullsubject,smcbi.facevaluedis,scm.shortname as caizhi, rd.guestWRWeight as zhongliang,rd.guestWRSize as size,rd.version,rc.remark as coinremark,rd.guestWRGrade as grade, rd.requestid,rcs.level,rc.score,rc.ratingreasondis from request_coin rc left join request_coin_score rcs on rcs.requestcoinid=rc.id, request_detail rd, sys_mechanism_coin_basic_info smcbi left join sys_coin_material scm on scm.id=smcbi.material, sys_country sc,request_main r where rd.id=rc.requestdetailid AND smcbi.country=sc.id AND rd.coinid=smcbi.id AND r.id=rd.requestid AND rc.id=#{requestcoinid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} group by rc.coincode

SELECT r.entitytype, r.requestcode, smcbi.years, sc.shortname AS coincountry, rc.coincode, rc.tagindex, rc.remark, rc.ratingreasondis, rd.evaluate, rd.numindex, r.usercode, r.customer, r.mobile, r.mail, r.serviceid, r.speed, r.totalamount, r.totalweight, r.totalpreferential, r.othercost, r.totalevaluate, r.totalreqcost, r.totalpremium, r.totaltransportation, r.totalinsurance, r.totalcost, r.sendtype, r.payment, rc.score, ExtractValue ( co.fullname, "//value[@lang='zh_CN']" ) AS country, ExtractValue ( p. NAME, "//value[@lang='zh_CN']" ) AS province, ExtractValue ( c.fullname, "//value[@lang='zh_CN']" ) AS city, ExtractValue ( d.fullname, "//value[@lang='zh_CN']" ) AS area, r.address, r.paystatus, rd.guestappraisal, rd.totalreqcost AS totalcoincost, rd.coinid, num.gpn AS sameCoinNum FROM ( SELECT rc1.coincode, rc1.coinid AS cid, count(*) AS gpn FROM request_coin rc1 LEFT JOIN request_detail rd1 ON rc1.requestid = rd1.requestid AND rc1.coinid = rd1.coinid LEFT JOIN request_main r1 ON rc1.requestid = r1.id WHERE r1.requestcode = #{requestcode,jdbcType=INTEGER} GROUP BY rc1.coinid ) num, request_coin rc LEFT JOIN request_detail rd ON rc.requestid = rd.requestid AND rc.coinid = rd.coinid LEFT JOIN request_main r ON rc.requestid = r.id LEFT JOIN sys_country co ON r.country = co.id LEFT JOIN sys_province p ON r.province = p.id LEFT JOIN sys_city c ON r.city = c.id LEFT JOIN sys_district d ON r.area = d.id LEFT JOIN sys_mechanism_coin_basic_info smcbi ON rc.coinid = smcbi.id LEFT JOIN sys_country sc ON sc.id = smcbi.country WHERE r.requestcode = #{requestcode,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND num.cid = rd.coinid ORDER BY coincode ASC

SELECT rc.id, rc.coincode, sc.shortname AS guojia, sacbi.years, sacbi.fullsubject, sacbi.facevaluedis, rc.customSize AS size, rc.difversion, scm.shortname AS caizhi, rcs.score, rcs.scoreby, rcs.`level`, rcs.remark, rc.remark AS pubremark, rcs.ratingreasondis FROM request_coin rc LEFT JOIN request_coin_score rcs ON rcs.requestcoinid = rc.id AND rcs.scoreby = #{scoreby} AND rcs.`level` = '1' LEFT JOIN request_detail rd ON rd.id = rc.requestdetailid LEFT JOIN request_main r ON r.id = rc.requestid LEFT JOIN sys_mechanism_coin_basic_info sacbi ON sacbi.id = rc.coinid LEFT JOIN sys_country sc ON sc.id = sacbi.country LEFT JOIN sys_coin_material scm ON scm.id = sacbi.material WHERE rc.requestid = #{requestid} ORDER BY rc.coincode

SELECT rc.id, rc.coincode, sacbi.guojia, sacbi.years, sacbi.fullsubject, sacbi.facevaluedis, rc.guestWRGrade AS grade, scm.shortname AS caizhi, rc.customSize AS size, rc.difversion, rcs.score, rcs.scoreby, rcs.`level`, rcs.remark, rc.remark AS pubremark, rcs.ratingreasondis FROM request_coin rc LEFT JOIN request_coin_score rcs ON rcs.requestcoinid = rc.id, ( SELECT s.*, ExtractValue ( t.fullname, "//value[@lang='zh_CN']" ) AS guojia FROM sys_mechanism_coin_basic_info s, sys_country t WHERE s.country = t.id ) sacbi LEFT JOIN sys_coin_material scm ON sacbi.material = scm.id, request_detail rd WHERE rd.id = rc.requestdetailid AND rd.coinid = sacbi.id AND rc.requestid = #{requestid} ORDER BY rc.coincode, rcs. LEVEL, rcs.scoreby

SELECT rc.id, rc.coincode, sacbi.guojia, years, sacbi.fullsubject, sacbi.facevaluedis, scm.shortname AS caizhi, rc.customSize AS size, rc.difversion, rc.score, rc.remark AS pubremark, rc.ratingreasondis FROM request_detail rd LEFT JOIN request_coin rc ON rc.requestdetailid = rd.id LEFT JOIN request_main r ON r.id = rd.requestid LEFT JOIN ( SELECT s.*, ExtractValue ( t.fullname, "//value[@lang='zh_CN']" ) AS guojia FROM sys_mechanism_coin_basic_info s, sys_country t WHERE s.country = t.id ) sacbi ON sacbi.id = rd.coinid LEFT JOIN sys_coin_material scm ON scm.id = sacbi.material WHERE rd.requestid = #{requestid} ORDER BY rc.coincode

SELECT c.years, c.catalogue, ( CASE WHEN c.shortsubject IS NULL THEN c.fullsubject ELSE c.shortsubject END ) shortsubject, c.version, c.facevaluedis, ExtractValue ( t.fullname, "//value[@lang='zh_CN']" ) AS country, ExtractValue ( m.fullname, "//value[@lang='zh_CN']" ) AS material, rc.score, rc.coincode, rc.difversion, rc.ratingreasondis FROM sys_mechanism_coin_basic_info c, sys_coin_material m, sys_country t, request_coin rc WHERE rc.coincode LIKE CONCAT(#{requestCode}, '%') AND rc.coinid = c.id AND m.id = c.material AND t.id = c.country ORDER BY coincode

SELECT c.catalogue, c.years, c.shortsubject, c.version, c.facevaluedis, ( CASE WHEN rc.weight IS NOT NULL AND rc.weight != '' THEN rc.weight WHEN rd.guestWRWeight IS NOT NULL AND rd.guestWRWeight != '' THEN rd.guestWRWeight WHEN c.weight IS NOT NULL AND c.weight != '' THEN c.weight END ) weight, rc.customsize size, ( CASE c.country WHEN c.country = '1' THEN ExtractValue ( t.fullname, "//value[@lang='zh_CN']" ) ELSE ExtractValue ( t.fullname, "//value[@lang='zh_CN']" ) END ) AS country, ( SELECT ExtractValue ( m.fullname, "//value[@lang='zh_CN']" ) FROM sys_coin_material m WHERE m.id = c.material ) material, rc.score, rc.coincode, rc.difversion, rc.ratingreasondis FROM sys_mechanism_coin_basic_info c, sys_country t, request_coin rc, request_detail rd WHERE rc.coincode LIKE CONCAT(#{requestCode}, '%') AND rc.coinid = c.id AND rc.requestdetailid = rd.id AND t.id = c.country ORDER BY coincode
